biography: Gizmodrome is a new supergroup formed by Adrian Belew (Zappa, King Crimson, Talking Heads, Bowie), Stewart Copeland (The Police), Vittorio Cosma (Elio e le Storie Tese, PFM, Deproducers) and Mark King (Level 42). GIZMODROME is: STEWART COPELAND: drums and vocals ADRIAN BELEW: guitars and vocals MARK KING: bass and vocals VITTORIO COSMA: organ and keyboards Read more on Last.fm.
